title: Despite law, US TikTok ban likely to remain on hold

content.author: AFP
content.description: ​Trump said a group of purchasers is ready to pay TikTok owner ByteDance "a lot of money" for the video-clip-sharing sensation's US operations. Trump has repeatedly downplayed risks that TikTok is in danger, saying he remains confident of finding a buyer for …
